markdownRemark.html:
We all know the second income is taxed at the highest marginal rate - but how much is it really taxed?

When you are married filing jointly you would think the second income is simply charged at the highest marginal rate but you would be wrong.

frontmatter.title: Why I don't let my doctor wife work
frontmatter.description: Exposing the hidden income tax bracket of 45 percent
